text: Jon Michael Wefald (November 24, 1937 â€“ April 16, 2022) was an American educator. He was the twelfth president of Kansas State University from 1986 until 2009. Wefalf was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota. Wefald died on April 16, 2022 in St. Cloud, Minnesota from a heart attack, aged 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Educators from Minneapolis Category:Academics from Kansas
title: Jon Wefald
